snippet.title: Magical Drop VI || Premiere date announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Magical Drop VI premieres on Nintendo Switch, Steam and GOG on April 25th!
The game premiere date on Xbox One and PlayStation 4 is TBA

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2176320/Magical_Drop_VI/

Enter the mystical world, in which new challenges seek upon every corner! Play as the residents of the Magical Land, see the world with their eyes, and help them to unite the divided world together!

-----------------------------
